attribute.name: CURRENT_GMT_TIME
attribute.description: the attribute will be assigned current time value during evaluation

attribute.name: CURRENT_GMT_DATE
attribute.description: the attribute will be assigned current date value during evaluation

attribute.name: SYS_SUBJECTGROUPS
attribute.description: List of unqualified group names to which user belongs: ["admin", "managers"]

attribute.name: SYS_USER
attribute.description: Current user: unqualified form: system

attribute.name: SYS_APP
attribute.description: Unqualified name of the binding resource for the resource on which the query is performed: admin

attribute.name: SYS_OBJ_TYPE
attribute.description: ResourceType on which the query is performed: LibraryResourceType

attribute.name: SYS_OBJ
attribute.description: Resource on which the query is performed: bar

attribute.name: SYS_OBJ_Q
attribute.description: Full qualified resource name on which the query is performed: /foo/bar

attribute.name: SYS_PRIVILEGE
attribute.description: Unqualified name of the action on which the resource is being queried.

function.name: BOOLEAN_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:boolean-equal The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches RHS (right-hand side);If LHS or RHS is a multiple value attribute and the other side is single value attribute,the function returns false;If both LHS and RHS are multiple value attribute, they have the same number of elements and for each element from the list on the left, there exists an element from the list on the right, the function returns true.

function.name: STRING_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:string-equal The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches RHS (right-hand side); If LHS or RHS is a multiple value attribute and the other side is single value attribute, the function returns false; If both LHS and RHS are multiple value attribute, they have the same number of elements and for each element from the list on the left, there exists an element from the list on the right, the function returns true.

function.name: INTEGER_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:integer-equal The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches RHS (right-hand side); If LHS or RHS is a multiple value attribute and the other side is single value attribute, the function returns false; If both LHS and RHS are multiple value attribute, they have the same number of elements and for each element from the list on the left, there exists an element from the list on the right, the function returns true.

function.name: DATE_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:date-equal The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches RHS (right-hand side); If LHS or RHS is a multiple value attribute and the other side is single value attribute, the function returns false; If both LHS and RHS are multiple value attribute, they have the same number of elements and for each element from the list on the left, there exists an element from the list on the right, the function returns true.

function.name: TIME_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:time-equal The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches RHS (right-hand side); If LHS or RHS is a multiple value attribute and the other side is single value attribute, the function returns false; If both LHS and RHS are multiple value attribute, they have the same number of elements and for each element from the list on the left, there exists an element from the list on the right, the function returns true.

function.name: STRING_IS_IN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:string-is-in The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches one of the values in RHS (right-hand side); LHS should be single-valued. RHS can be single or multi-valued.

function.name: INTEGER_IS_IN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:integer-is-in The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches one of the values in RHS (right-hand side); LHS should be single-valued. RHS can be single or multi-valued.

function.name: DATE_IS_IN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:date-is-in The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches one of the values in RHS (right-hand side); LHS should be single-valued. RHS can be single or multi-valued.

function.name: TIME_IS_IN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:time-is-in The function returns true if the LHS (left-hand side) matches one of the values in RHS (right-hand side); LHS should be single-valued. RHS can be single or multi-valued.

function.name: INTEGER_GREATER_THAN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:integer-greater-than The function returns true if the value of LHS is greater than RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: INTEGER_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:integer-greater-than-or-equal The function returns true if the value of LHS is greater than or equals to RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: INTEGER_LESS_THAN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:integer-less-than The function returns true if the value of LHS is less than RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: INTEGER_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:integer-less-than-or-equal The function returns true if the value of LHS is less than or equals to RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: TIME_GREATER_THAN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:time-greater-than The function returns true if the value of LHS is greater than RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: TIME_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:time-greater-than-or-equal The function returns true if the value of LHS is greater than or equals to RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: TIME_LESS_THAN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:time-less-than The function returns true if the value of LHS is less than RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: TIME_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:time-less-than-or-equal The function returns true if the value of LHS is less than or equals to RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: DATE_GREATER_THAN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:date-greater-than The function returns true if the value of LHS is greater than RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: DATE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:date-greater-than-or-equal The function returns true if the value of LHS is greater than or equals to RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: DATE_LESS_THAN
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:date-less-than The function returns true if the value of LHS is less than RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: DATE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:date-less-than-or-equal The function returns true if the value of LHS is less than or equals to RHS. Both LHS and RHS should be single value.

function.name: STRING_REGEXP_MATCH
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:string-regexp-match The LHS should be a single-value string type attribute/value. The RHS should be a single value string which complies with Java Regular Expression.

function.name: OR
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:or The function stands for an OR operation between two single-value boolean expressions/values.

function.name: AND
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:and The function stands for an AND operation between two single-value boolean expressions/values.

function.name: NOT
function.description: function: urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:not The function stands for a NOT operation on a single-value boolean expression/value.

function.name: VALID_FOR_MSECONDS
function.description: function: valid_for_mseconds The function accepts a single integer value.

function.name: VALID_FOR_SECONDS
function.description: function: valid_for_seconds The function accepts a single integer value.

function.name: VALID_FOR_MINUTES
function.description: function: valid_for_minutes The function accepts a single integer value.

function.name: VALID_FOR_HOURS
function.description: function: valid_for_hours The function accepts a single integer value.

function.name: VALID_UNTIL_TIME
function.description: function: valid_until_time The function accepts a single time value.

function.name: VALID_UNTIL_DATE
function.description: function: valid_until_date The function accepts a single date value.

function.name: ATTRIBUTE_HAS_VALUE
function.description: function: sys_defined The function accepts a single string value.
